stripped_text: +1 mu You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.) Limit 1 console per player.
